## Overview

- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/atlasevm)
- [Whitepaper](https://github.com/FastLane-Labs/atlas_whitepaper/blob/main/Atlas_Whitepaper.pdf)

Atlas is a generalized execution abstraction protocol that facilitates programmable MEV mitigation at the application layer. It does this by facilitating app-specific orderflow auctions, both intent-centric and backrun auctions.
